summary: Replaces Daedric and Ebony sword and greatsword with new meshes.
descriptionHtml:
Install by putting the folders into the skyrim data folder. 

Uninstall by removing the greatsword and sword meshes and the 1st person versions from the data\\meshes\\weapons\\ebony folder, removing the same daedric meshes from the daedric weapons folder, and removing the \"longswords\" and \"bastards\" folders from textures\\74_w.

---

[url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3296]Less sexual female armor[/url]
